sent.orig: See Usage Note at every, neither, or 1.
Neither riches nor honours can corrupt him; neither poverty nor humbleness can make him swerve from principle; and neither threats nor forces can subdue him.
sent.trans: 富贵不能淫， 贫贱不能移，威武不能屈。

sent.orig: In addition Lara has neither audio helmet, neither PDA, neither grenades, nor binoculars.
sent.trans: 另外，劳拉没有耳机，没有掌上电脑，没有手雷，也没有望远镜。

sent.orig: Zen is neither Taoist nor Buddhist; it is both and neither.
sent.trans: 禅既不是道教，也不是佛教；它既是两者，又不是两者。

sent.orig: Graduate teaching assistants are neither fish nor fowl, neither completely students nor teachers.
sent.trans: 研究生助教既不完全是学生，又不完全是教师，而是介于二者之间。
